'''Ria File'''是日本的《[[eXceed]]》系列弹幕游戏及其衍生作品的登场角色之一。

==简介==
《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》的主角。

==名片==
'''原名'''：Ria File

'''年龄'''：大概是少女的年龄

'''种族'''：人类

'''身高'''：中等

==事迹==
{{Hide
|标题=英文原文<ref>http://exceedseries.com/portfolio/ria-file</ref>
|内容=Ria is the half-vampire, half-human protagonist of eXceed 2nd – Vampire REX.

As a young girl, Ria lived in human society, but she was treated cruelly because she was a ‘deviant’ – a person possessing both human and vampire blood.

When Ria awakened to her magical powers, she used them to escape her confines and run away. The Church pursued her relentlessly, but just when all seemed lost, the leader of the vampires, the Undying Lord appeared and took her in.

To repay Undead Lord for saving her life, Ria joined the deviant army and dreams of someday fighting by the side of the Undying Lord to save people like herself and others from the tyranny of the humans.

}}
《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》 中的自机。

Ria 在 《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》 中是一个半人半吸血鬼。

当Ria还是个小女孩的时候，她住在人类社会里，但她被残忍的对待因为她是一个‘变异者’（deviant）——一个持有吸血鬼和人类血统的人。

当Ria的魔法能力觉醒的时候，她用自己的能力来摆脱限制和逃跑。教会无情地追杀他，但眼见就要逃不掉的时候，吸血鬼的领袖，不死领主（Undying Lord）出现了和救走了Ria。

为了报答不死领主（Undead Lord）的救命之恩，Ria加入了变异者军队和梦想着有一天能站在不死领着的一边为了保护像她那样被人类暴政欺负的人。
（待补）

==她的能力、特质==
{{Hide
|标题=英文原文<ref>http://exceedseries.com/portfolio/ria-file</ref>
|内容=Ria’s ‘Ruin’s Legis’ ability allows her to switch between human and vampire forms at will. This not a magical ability, but a unique characteristic that Ria possesses.

}}
Ria的能力‘堕落的法则’（Ruin’s Legis）能够让其在人类与吸血鬼之间随其意志转换。这不是魔法能力，但Ria是一个相当特殊的角色。



{{EXceed系列}}
